description: Manage scoped resource of a private link scope resource.

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope scoped-resource create
commands.summary: Create a scoped resource for a private link scope resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor private-link-scope scoped-resource create --name
                                                     --resource-group
                                                     --scope-name
                                                     [--linked-resource]
                                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az monitor private-link-scope scoped-resource create -g MyResourceGroup -n MyName --linked-resource MyID --scope-name MyScope

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope scoped-resource delete
commands.summary: Delete a scoped resource of a private link scope resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor private-link-scope scoped-resource delete [--ids]
                                                     [--name]
                                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                     [--resource-group]
                                                     [--scope-name]
                                                     [--subscription]
                                                     [--yes]
examples: az monitor private-link-scope scoped-resource delete -g MyResourceGroup -n MyName --scope-name MyScope

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope scoped-resource list
commands.summary: List all scoped resource of a private link scope resource.
examples: az monitor private-link-scope scoped-resource list -g MyResourceGroup --scope-name MyScope

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope scoped-resource show
commands.summary: Show a scoped resource of a private link scope resource.
examples: az monitor private-link-scope scoped-resource show -g MyResourceGroup -n MyName --scope-name MyScope

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope scoped-resource wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
